body_html:
@yinghai
I tried to disable blas dependency in this PR. But not sure.
Could you try it on your side. If still not work, could you send the error log?
There should be some way to avoid the linking error.

According to MKL-DNN src, the IGEMM should be disabled if MKL is too old.
So, I'm not sure the root-cause of the error you encountered so far.

BTW, the strict_overflow issue reported by users is also fixed in the PR.

body:
@yinghai 
I tried to disable blas dependency in this PR. But not sure.
Could you try it on your side. If still not work, could you send the error log?
There should be some way to avoid the linking error.

According to MKL-DNN src, the IGEMM should be disabled if MKL is too old.
So, I'm not sure the root-cause of the error you encountered so far.

BTW, the strict_overflow issue reported by users is also fixed in the PR.
